meanings.sent1: After his release, the recommittal to prison was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The recommittal of the case to the court led to further investigation.
meanings.sent3: The recommittal of the lost dog to the shelter turned into a heartwarming reunion.
meanings.sent4: Her recommittal to her studies showed her dedication to learning.
meanings.sent5: The recommittal of the contract ensured all parties understood the terms clearly.

meanings.definition: The state of being committed again.
meanings.sent1: The recommittal of the patient to the hospital was necessary for proper care.
meanings.sent2: His recommittal to the project showed his strong work ethic.
meanings.sent3: The recommittal of the book to the library marked the end of a great adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her recommittal to her fitness routine resulted in noticeable improvements.
meanings.sent5: The recommittal of the team to their goal inspired others to join their cause.
